title: Request Support for Website Accessibility  |  Utilities  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Utilities Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Utilities>Accessibility Request Support for Website Accessibility ​​​Please note this form is for reporting questions or concerns related to individuals with disabilities and their ability to access web content on the University’s website. This form is to be used by individuals with disabilities who experience a barrier to accessing online content or by individuals with questions regarding the website’s accessibility to persons with disabilities, pursuant to the Americans With Disabilities Act (“ADA”) and the Rehabilitation Act of 1973. Please do not use this form for requests that are unrelated to website access for individuals with disabilities. Smart Form Standard Web Part 2 ​​
